tool.name: search_skill
tool.description:
Search and list available skills in the system. Skills are directories in 'prompt/skills/' containing a SKILL.md file.
Usage: - Call without 'query' to list all available skills - Call with 'query' to search skills by name or description
Examples: - query: "ssrf" - Find skills related to SSRF detection - query: "" (empty) - List all available skills

parameters.parameter: Search keyword to filter skills by name, title or description. If not provided, returns all available skills.

tool.name: load_skill
tool.description:
Load a specific skill to get detailed instructions for a task. Reads the SKILL.md file from the skill directory, parsing YAML metadata and prompt content.
Usage: - Use search_skill first to find available skills - Then use load_skill with the skill name (directory name)
The loaded skill provides: - Metadata (name, description, etc.) - Detailed Prompt Instructions
Examples: - name: "ssrf" - Load SSRF detection skill (from prompt/skills/ssrf/SKILL.md)

parameters.parameter: The skill identifier (directory name) to load. Use the exact name returned by search_skill.

returns.field: Whether the skill was loaded successfully
